column4: try installing one of the openoffice.org-l10n-xx packages, where xx is a language or country code. For example, the us english one is openoffice.org-l10n-en-us
but if you go to, say, /usr/lib/openoffice/share/registry/schema/org/openoffice/Office and type pwd > file it won't do it. and neither will it do it if i use sudo
